ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We are grateful for financial support from the Swiss Programme for Research on Global Issues for Development (r4d), funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF) and the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC), for the project “Woody invasive alien species in East Africa: Assessing and mitigating their negative impact on ecosystem services and rural livelihood” (Grant Number: 400440_152085). We thank the staff of Addis Ababa University's Water and Land Resource Center for their support and facilitation services, Marlène Thibault from University of Bern Centre for Development and Environment (CDE) for critically editing the English language, and Urs Schaffner of CABI‐Switzerland for the critical comments of the manuscript.
